body:

What if during the 'honeymoon' her never answers her and when they get back what is waiting for her is divorce papers and a USB of their affair and a letter from the attorney of suing them for compensation?
Time to stop reading ntr boiz

wow! just amazing. i mean about japanese man. they are one of a kind huh. they can accept almost anything. even if his girl cheat him broad day light. next day. ''let's get married cuz i still love u'' just plz don't sleep around again okay. i feel like ur far away. (hoe is million miles away but still he don't want to admit) then something like. i'm still happy to get ur used pussy. (almost need to use word public their) so don't do it okay. say's the mc. girl continues to fuck around. then again mc-i still love her tho. BOOOM! no wonder aliens don't come here
Seriously like WTF dude you know she's cheating yet you marry the Hoe-bag wow. Oh ya this is hentai you need to drop your brain cells to understand it.
Haha only in these ntr doujin will a guy get married to a slut like that and let her get impregnated by another guy.
Dumbass got married, he should have just ran away
He deserve it!! damn as much as i don't like NTR, this one is a great masterpiece. don't play with innocent girl or she'll be corrupted and she get you back
